matrix.db
Class Context

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--matrix.db.Context
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Context
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Models a logical representation of a Matrix context object

See Also:

disconnect

public void disconnect()
                throws MatrixException
Disconnect from the BOS. At this time, disconnect does not close the connection to the BOS. Since connecting is an expensive operation, we chose to stay connected while the applet is running. To close the connection, call the shutdown method.
Throws:
MatrixException - when unable to retrieve data from the BOS
Since:
ADK 2.0

shutdown

public void shutdown()
              throws MatrixException

Throws:
MatrixException - when unable to retrieve data from the BOS
Since:
ADK 2.0

public void start(boolean update)
           throws MatrixException
Start a transaction. Before starting a transaction, use isTransactionActive to determine if a transaction is still active.
Parameters:
update - true if transaction will update.
Throws:
MatrixException - when unable to retrieve data from the BOS

isTransactionActive

public boolean isTransactionActive()
Test for active transaction. Before starting a transaction, use this method to determine if a transaction is still active. If the result is false, it's safe to start another transaction. If true, you must abort or commit the active transaction before starting a new one.
Since:
ADK 9.0.3.1.0.1

getTransactionType

public int getTransactionType()
Test for active transaction.
Since:
ADK 9.0.3.1.0.1

setTrace

public void setTrace(java.lang.String filename,
                     java.lang.String type,
                     boolean onFlag,
                     boolean allFlag)
              throws MatrixException
Turn tracing of specified type on/off for this/all sessions
Parameters:
String - filename: name of file for tracing output
String - type: type of tracing desired (all caps: MQL, SQL, MINE)
boolean - onFlag: true to turn trace on, false to turn it off
boolean - allFlag: true to trace all sessions; false for this session
Returns:
none
Throws:
MatrixException - when context cannot be established
Since:
ADK 9.5

getExistingContext

public static Context getExistingContext()
Returns the current running context, if one is avaialable. This methid will return the current context that was used to invoke the JPO. If this method is called outlsided the JPO context, it will return null. It is up to the caller to check for null and create its own context if needed
Returns:
current context or null if none avaialable.
